oracion: Maria: Alright, Jetsun, you’re next. I’m going to teach you about activities that humans like to do. When you go live with your new family, you can do these activities with them! Ok, let’s go!
Maria: This is a basketball. You shoot the basketball into the hoop, like this!

Jetsun: What happens after you shoot the basketball into the hoop?
Maria: Well, you get points. Two teams play against each other to see who gets more points.
Jetsun: That sounds fun!
Maria: It is!
Maria: Now this is a soccer ball. You kick it into the goal, like this.

Jetsun: Ok, let me try!
Maria: Good job, Jetsun!
Maria: People like to play these sports to get exercise and fresh air. There are many sports in the world.
Maria: There’s basketball, baseball, soccer, volleyball, tennis… and many more!

Maria: Do you like playing these sports?
Jetsun: Yes, I like playing soccer the most!
Maria: Great! You are going to be a good teammate for your new family
